text: Colin Lewes Hanks (born Colin Lewes Dillingham;State of California. California Birth Index, 1905-1995. Gives name at birth as "Colin Lewes Dillingham" November 24, 1977) is an American actor, director and producer. He is known for his roles such as Shaun Brumder in Orange County, Preston in King Kong, Oliver in The House Bunny, and Troy Gable in The Great Buck Howard. He is the oldest son of actor Tom Hanks. *a "I was born and raised in Sacramento, California, which most people don’t know is where Tower started and was based until the end." — ¶ 4. == Personal life == Hanks married Samantha Bryant and have two daughters Olivia and Charlotte. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Sacramento, California Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Jewish American actors Category:Movie directors from California Category:Movie producers from California
title: Colin Hanks
